alert.note: Alert for Garfield (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 03 at 12:58PM CDT until July 03 at 1:30PM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Norman has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Garfield County in northern Oklahoma... * Until 130 PM CDT. * At 1258 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 5 miles west of Douglas, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Enid, Waukomis, Garber, Covington, Fairmont, Douglas, Vance Air Force Base, Bison, and Hayward. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
